name: Love Is War | Game A Week Challenge 01
name_original: Love Is War | Game A Week Challenge 01
description:
The goal is to have the most points in the given time. 
The timer starts at 2 minutes and goes down to 0, reaches 0 the 
game ends.  The player can click and hold the left mouse click 
to drop arrows on the map. The goal being to "kill" the tikis 
that appear to have points. By killing them, the player's 
"Love Streak" increases and at certain points the love steak 
grants an effect.  A 10: The love steak activates the function of
 shooting several arrows at the same time.  Be careful not to 
touch the blue tikis, the blue tikis kill enemies in addition to 
completely removing your Love streak to reset it to 0.
